CustomField.description: If the number of DCO soft credits is above the threshold, then all the soft credits will be combined into one line in the gift processing screen. Also, a batch will be used to create the soft credits.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If the number of DCO soft credits is above the threshold, then all the soft credits will be combined into one line in the gift processing screen. Also, a batch will be used to create the soft credits.
CustomField.label: DCO Batch Processing Threshold
